Danny Glover DBC SF

Unit 1 Week 1 Part 7: Affirming Your Values

Home

  • Exercise 1:

    When you think of the times in your life where you've been the happiest, the proudest, or the most satisfied, which of the following values come to mind?

    • The following values come to mind: Courage, Challenge, Leadership, Competence

  • Exercise 2:

    Pick one value and write a couple of sentences about why one of the values you chose is important to you.

    • Leadership is a very important value to me. I find I am happiest when I am leading effectively and when others feel they can rely on me for sound leadership. I am not frightened by the idea of a greater responsibility that comes with leading a team and I think I work best while leading. I don't think I am all knowing or always right when leading, instead I really like working to make sure everyone on my team feels they play an equally significant role as everyone else.

  • Exercise 3:

    Answer the following for the values you chose in Exercise 1: In general, I try to live up to these values:

    • Courage Disagree 1 ----- 2 ----- 3 ----- 4 ----- 5 Agree

    Challenge Disagree 1 ----- 2 ----- 3 ----- 4 ----- 5 Agree

    Leadership Disagree 1 ----- 2 ----- 3 ----- 4 ----- 5 Agree

    Confidence Disagree 1 ----- 2 ----- 3 ----- 4 ----- 5 Agree

  • Exercise 4:

    What was the last topic that someone asked for your advice on?

    • The last topic someone asked me for advice on, and the most common topic I am asked for advice on, was technology. I am often troubleshooting my families various technology issues from iPhones not working properly to which types of technology to invest in.
